english.segment1: Our Father, who art in Heaven. Hallowed be thy name. Come and let Your glory, Come and let Your glory fall.
english.segment2: Our Father, who art in Heaven. The rocks cry out Your fame. Come and let Your glory, Come and let Your glory fall.
english.segment3: I will sing, sing a new song. I will sing, sing a new song. I will sing, sing a new song to the Lord
english.segment4: Let your kingdom come. Let your will be done. On earth as it is in heaven. Every eye proclaim. The mercy of Your name. On earth as it is in heaven.
english.segment5: God give us new every morning. Mercy his daily bread. In the name of Jesus. In the name of Jesus we pray
english.segment6: And lead us, not to temptation. But deliver us with Your hand. In the name of Jesus. In the name of Jesus we pray. Father we pray
english.segment7: I will sing, sing a new song. I will sing, sing a new song. I will sing, sing a new song to the Lord
english.segment8: Let your kingdom come. Let your will be done. On earth as it is in heaven. Every eye proclaim. The mercy of Your name. On earth as it is in heaven.
english.segment9: For the kingdom is yours. And the power is yours. And the glory forever Amen. For the kingdom is yours. And the power is yours. And the glory forever Amen. For the kingdom is yours. And the power is yours. And the glory forever Amen. For the kingdom is yours. And the power is yours. And the glory forever Amen
english.segment10: Let your kingdom come. Let your will be done. On earth as it is in heaven. Every eye proclaim. The mercy of Your name. On earth as it is in heaven
